trans-unit.source: Dynamically hit tests a stroke with an eraser path.
trans-unit.target: Realiza teste de clique dinâmico em um traço com um caminho de borracha.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester> hit tests strokes by determining when a eraser path intersects that stroke.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester> faz testes traços determinando quando um caminho de borracha intercepta traço.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester.AddPoints%2A> method in the stylus events to add the points to the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester>.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester.AddPoints%2A> método nos eventos de caneta para adicionar os pontos para a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester>.

trans-unit.source: When the points added to the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester> intersect a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>, the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester> raises the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester.StrokeHit> event.
trans-unit.target: Quando os pontos é adicionada para o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester> intersect um <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>, o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester> gera o <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester.StrokeHit> evento.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to dynamically erase a portion of a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como apagar dinamicamente uma parte de um <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.

trans-unit.source: To create a control that enables a user to erase ink, see [How to: Erase Ink on a Custom Control](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-erase-ink-on-a-custom-control.md).
trans-unit.target: Para criar um controle que permite que um usuário apagar tinta, consulte [como: apagar tinta em um controle personalizado](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-erase-ink-on-a-custom-control.md).

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester" /> intersects an ink <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke" />.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester" /> intersecciona um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke" /> de tinta.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to dynamically erase a portion of a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como apagar dinamicamente uma parte de um <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.

trans-unit.source: To create a control that enables a user to erase ink, see [How to: Erase Ink on a Custom Control](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-erase-ink-on-a-custom-control.md).
trans-unit.target: Para criar um controle que permite que um usuário apagar tinta, consulte [como: apagar tinta em um controle personalizado](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-erase-ink-on-a-custom-control.md).
